styles: :host { display: inline-block; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif; } .counter { display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem; padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem; background: #f8f9fa; border: 1px solid #dee2e6; border-radius: 0.5rem; } .label { font-weight: 500; color: #495057; } .value { font-size: 1.25rem; font-weight: 600; min-width: 2rem; text-align: center; color: #212529; } button { width: 2rem; height: 2rem; padding: 0; font-size: 1.25rem; font-weight: 500; color: #fff; background: #0d6efd; border: none; border-radius: 0.375rem; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.15s; } button:hover:not(:disabled) { background: #0b5ed7; } button:active:not(:disabled) { background: #0a58ca; } button:disabled { background: #6c757d; cursor: not-allowed; }
